text: " Mircea Hava (born 26 December 1956 in Oradea) is a Romanian politician. engineer and member of the European Parliament. Hava was elected to the European Parliament on the list of the [National Liberal Party. Hava was also mayor of Alba Iulia for 25 years, during 1991 and 1992 and then from 1996 to 2019. He was a member of the Democratic Party and is now a member of the National Liberal Party. In 2004 he was reelected with more than 70% of the votes. ==Orders and decorations== * Officer National Order of Merit – 2011 * Knight National Order of Merit – 2004 ==References== Translated in part from the corresponding article in the Polish Wikipedia Category:Mayors of places in Romania Category:Democratic Liberal Party (Romania) politicians Category:National Liberal Party (Romania) politicians Category:Living people Category:1956 births Category:Recipients of the National Order of Merit (Romania)
title: Mircea Hava
